name: Lavender
description: Lavender is a fragrant herb with a sweet, floral flavor. It is commonly used in aromatherapy and has been found to have a calming effect on the mind and body.
consumption_method: Lavender can be brewed into a tea, added to baked goods, or used as a seasoning for savory dishes.

name: Chamomile
description: Chamomile is a gentle herb with a sweet, apple-like flavor. It is often used to promote relaxation and reduce anxiety.
consumption_method: Chamomile can be brewed into a tea or added to baked goods.

name: Peppermint
description: Peppermint is a refreshing herb with a strong, cooling flavor. It is commonly used to soothe digestive issues and freshen breath.
consumption_method: Peppermint can be brewed into a tea, added to baked goods, or used as a seasoning for savory dishes.

name: Rosemary
description: Rosemary is an aromatic herb with a woody, pine-like flavor. It is often used to add flavor to savory dishes and has been found to have antioxidant properties.
consumption_method: Rosemary can be used as a seasoning for savory dishes or brewed into a tea.

name: Ginger
description: Ginger is a spicy herb with a pungent, citrus-like flavor. It is commonly used to aid digestion and reduce inflammation.
consumption_method: Ginger can be used as a seasoning for savory dishes, brewed into a tea, or added to baked goods.

name: Turmeric
description: Turmeric is a brightly colored herb with a warm, earthy flavor. It is often used as a natural anti-inflammatory and has been found to have antioxidant properties.
consumption_method: Turmeric can be used as a seasoning for savory dishes or brewed into a tea.
